title: How to increase your chances with women
description:
Watch The Full Thing Here : 
————————————————————
Ready to build a network of amazing women and high-status men?

Michael’s Men of Action is a one-on-one Master’s program that teaches men how to create elite 
social lives by becoming higher status.

Click this link to learn how you can have a High-Status lifestyle now:
https://m.moamentoring.com/podcast

Click here to join the Men of Action community and watch the High-Status Networking 101 course:
https://m.moamentoring.com/moa-community

Interested in joining the Men of Action sales team? Apply here:
https://www.moamentoring.com/jobs/sales

Men of Action has an affiliate program! Post pre-made content and get paid passively:
https://www.moamentoring.com/affiliate
————————————————————

Subscribe on Youtube: 
https://www.youtube.com/user/MichaelSartain

Listen on Apple Podcast: 
https://podcasts.apple.com/us/podcast/the-michael-sartain-podcast/id1579791157

Listen on Spotify: 
https://open.spotify.com/show/2faAYwvDD9Bvkpwv6umlPO?si=8Q3ak9HnSlKjuChsTXr6YQ&dl_branch=1

#michael #michaelsartain #michael_sartain #michael_sartain_podcast

channel_info.title: Michael Sartain
channel_info.description:
🎙Host of The Michael Sartain Podcast 

🔥Teaching you how to build a network of desirable women and high-status men

👇 Click the "Men of Action" link below now to forge a high-status lifestyle and join the elites

transcription: {"text": "If you just try harder, by law of large numbers, you're just gonna get more. And to a certain extent, that has to be true. It's the central limit theorem in statistics. As n approaches infinity, you're gonna start to get a normal distribution. And some of the girls out here on the fat tail are just ready to all the time, as soon as you meet them. And if you bump into enough of these women, you're going to have more experience. The socios group of women, if you get into that group repeatedly, you're going to have less. The part that I had an issue with is when you're dealing with any level of attractiveness with women, that doesn't work anymore. What works then, you remember we talked about unfamiliar versus familiar environment. I have these frequent debates between cold approach pickup and what's called social circle. Showing very little intent to women in the beginning and building a social circle. A social circle is the familiar environment where things are a little bit more even and I'm able to show more of my characteristics. I'm a leader of men, a protector of loved ones, a willingness to walk away. I'm funny, people respect me and other women find me attractive. Those things come in a familiar environment that is created through social circle.
